definitions.definition: a mixture of two partially miscible liquids A and B produces two conjugate solutions: one of A in B and another of B in A
unite chemically so that the product is easily broken down into the original compounds
add inflections showing person, number, gender, tense, aspect, etc.
joined together especially in a pair or pairs
(of a pinnate leaflet) having only one pair of leaflets
formed by the union of two compounds
